item.title: Pragmatic Hacks: When 'Good Enough' is Actually Good Enough
item.description:
Sometimes the best solution isn’t the most elegant one. Sometimes it’s the one that works, ships quickly, and solves the problem at hand. This is the story of how I built a search widget for my blog using what purists might call “hacks” â€“ and why that was exactly the right choice.

If you haven’t already I suggest you check out Starting Small with Elm: A Widget Approach for some context; that’s where this Elm widget stuff all begun.
